  physical_appearance: \This is an assemblage consisting of small herb bottles
 baby amulet beads
 silk screen images of families
 as well as embroidery. The base fabric utilized is that of traditional Visayan \\patadyong\\. The central image is framed in a square/diamond-shaped embroidery while the other two silkscreen images are on the top right and left corners.  Triangular stitching with baby amulet beads frames each corner of the fabric. \

metadata.techniques_name: stitching (generic process)  embroidering  screen printing  weaving  beading (process)
metadata.physical_appearance: "This is an assemblage consisting of small herb bottles, baby amulet beads, silk screen images of families, as well as embroidery. The base fabric utilized is that of traditional Visayan ""patadyong"". The central image is framed in a square/diamond-shaped embroidery while the other two silkscreen images are on the top right and left corners.  Triangular stitching with baby amulet beads frames each corner of the fabric. "
